actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Africa, Global Health, Global Human Rights and International Organizations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Africa, Global Health, Global Human Rights and International Organizations

official_title: Commemorating the 50th anniversary of the founding of the Organization of African Unity (OAU) and commending its successor, the African Union.
subjects: Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

summary.text: Congratulates the former member states of the Organization of African Unity on the 50th year anniversary of its founding, in particular its original 32 member states. Commends African Union (AU) member states for their efforts to promote democratic societies, sustainable economic practices, and peace on the continent. Urges President Obama to support efforts to strengthen U.S.-AU cooperation, and encourages President Obama to expand U.S. efforts to achieve the goals of his United States Strategy Toward Sub-Saharan Africa.

titles.title: Commemorating the 50th anniversary of the founding of the Organization of African Unity (OAU) and commending its successor, the African Union.
